column4: Hey gents. I've looked through the FAQ and I can't seem to find this: I am about to "evolve" to Ubuntu on my laptop, but I'm not sure that there are proper drivers for the laptop for Ubuntu. Without a driver, the internal wifi doesn't work on Windows. How do I know it will all work?
It's internal in my gateway laptop
you can lookup your model here https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport , and in the forum www.ubuntuforums.org
